title: ETSI Domain AI + Creative Media
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-ai-creative-media-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20331
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain AI + Creative Media
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Cross-domain marker for metaverse components that combine artificial intelligence capabilities with creative media applications such as generative content, procedural generation, and AI-assisted authoring.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainAICreativeMedia
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[ComputationAndIntelligenceDomain]], [[CreativeMediaDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-ai-creative-media-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- enables:: [[Generative Content Classification]]
		- enables:: [[AI Art Categorization]]
		- categorizes:: [[Generative AI]]
		- categorizes:: [[AI Assisted Authoring]]
		- categorizes:: [[Procedural Content Generation]]
		- depends-on:: [[ETSI Domain AI]]
		- depends-on:: [[CreativeMediaDomain]]

ontology.definition: Cross-domain marker for metaverse components that combine artificial intelligence capabilities with creative media applications such as generative content, procedural generation, and AI-assisted authoring.
